reporting-org.narrative: The Global Fund to Fight AIDS, Tuberculosis and Malaria

title.narrative: Stop TB and AIDS through RRTTPR year 2021-23 (STAR 2021-23)

description.narrative: Thailand - TB/HIV - Department of Disease Control, Ministry of Public Health of the Royal Government of Thailand - DDC. This program has the following goals: To end AIDS in Thailand by 2030 (reducing annual new infections to below 1000 cases (from the current 8,134 estimated new infections annually). To reduce the prevalence of TB from 159 per 100,000 to 120 per 100,000 between 2015-2019. The objectives of this program are: Objective 6: To normalize HIV/TB and reduce stigma and discrimination.. Objective 1: To prevent the transmission of HIV and TB by sustaining intensive behavior change activities, appropriate use of prophylaxis and the strategic use of anti-retroviral drugs.. Objective 3: To ensure early and accurate diagnosis of both diseases by improving diagnostic capability, and reducing turn-around time (by using rapid HIV testing and molecular diagnostic techniques for TB). Objective 5: To foster collaborative activities across HIV and TB programs at national and sub-national levels, and ensure sustainability by strengthening linkages between community and health systems.. Objective 2: Actively find HIV and TB cases in the community and health care settings by recruiting 'at risk' and 'vulnerable populations' into HIV testing and TB screening.. Objective 4: To provide early treatment and ensure retention in care for all those diagnosed with HIV and/or TB.

title.narrative: Outcome indicator for THA-C-DDC
Case notification rate of all forms of TB per 100,000 population - bacteriologically confirmed plus clinically diagnosed, new and relapse cases
Percentage of people living with HIV and on ART who are virologically suppressed
Percentage of people living with HIV who know their HIV status at the end of the reporting period

TB treatment coverage: Percentage of new and relapse cases that were notified and treated among the estimated number of incident TB cases in the same year (all form of TB - bacteriologically confirmed plus clinically diagnosed)
Percentage of people living with HIV who report experiences of HIV-related discrimination in health-care settings
Percentage of other vulnerable populations who report the use of a condom at last sexual intercourse
Percentage of transgender people reporting using a condom in their last anal sex with a non-regular male partner
Percentage of men reporting the use of a condom the last time they had anal sex with a non regular partner
Percentage of sex workers reporting the use of a condom with their most recent client
Treatment success rate of RR TB and/or MDR-TB: Percentage of cases with RR and/or MDR-TB successfully treated
Percentage of people who inject drugs reporting the use of sterile injecting equipment the last time they injected
Treatment success rate of all forms of TB - bacteriologically confirmed plus clinically diagnosed, new and relapse cases
Percentage of men reporting the use of a condom the last time they had anal sex with a male partner
Percentage of adults and children with HIV, known to be on treatment 12 months after initiation of antiretroviral therapy
Percentage of (estimated) people living with HIV who have been tested HIV-positive
HIV O- other 1: Percentage of male sex workers reporting the use of a condom with their most recent client
Coverage / Output indicator for THA-C-DDC
Number of notified TB cases (all forms) contributed by non-national TB program providers – private/non-governmental facilities
Percentage of people on ART among all people living with HIV at the end of the reporting period
KP- other 5: Percentage of migrants reached with HIV prevention programs - defined package of services
Number of people in prisons or other closed settings that have received an HIV test during the reporting period and know their results
MDR TB- other 1: Percentage of previously treated TB patients receiving DST (bacteriologically positive cases only)
Percentage of people living with HIV newly initiated on ART who were screened for TB
Number of cases of XDR TB enrolled on treatment
Percentage of people living with HIV initiated on ART who are screened for TB in HIV treatment settings
Number of TB cases (all forms) notified among prisoners
Percentage of people living with HIV currently receiving antiretroviral therapy
KP- other 7: Percentage of partners that have received an HIV test during the reporting period and know their results
Percentage of TB patients with DST result for at least Rifampicin among the total number of notified (new and retreatment) cases in the same year
Percentage of HMIS or other routine reporting units submitting timely reports according to national guidelines
Percentage of registered new and relapse TB patients with documented HIV status
Percentage of men who have sex with men using PrEP in priority men who have sex with men PrEP populations
Number of TB cases (all forms) notified among key affected populations/ high risk groups (other than prisoners)
Percentage of PLHIV on ART who initiated TB preventive therapy among those eligible during the reporting period
Number of TB cases with RR-TB and/or MDR-TB notified
Percentage of confirmed MDR-TB cases tested for susceptibility to any fluoroquinolone and any second-line injectable drug
Percentage of sex workers reached with HIV prevention programs - defined package of services
Percentage of people who inject drugs that have received an HIV test during the reporting period and know their results
Percentage of men who have sex with men that have received an HIV test during the reporting period and know their results
Number of people in contact with TB patients who began preventive therapy
Percentage of MSM that have received an HIV test during the reporting period and know their results
Percentage of HIV-positive new and relapse TB patients on ART during TB treatment

Treatment success rate- all forms: Percentage of TB cases, all forms, bacteriologically confirmed plus clinically diagnosed, successfully treated (cured plus treatment completed) among all TB cases registered for treatment during a specified period, new and relapse cases
Percentage of eligible men who have sex with men who initiated oral antiretroviral PrEP during the reporting period
KP- other 3: Percentage of prisoners reached with HIV prevention programs - defined package of services
Percentage of MSM reached with HIV prevention programs - defined package of services
Percentage of confirmed RR/MDR-TB cases tested for resistance to second-line drugs
Percentage of people living with HIV newly enrolled in HIV care started on TB preventive therapy
Percentage of individuals receiving Opioid Substitution Therapy who received treatment for at least 6 months
KP-other2: Percentage of people in prisons and other close setting that have received an HIV test during the reporting period and know their results
Number of notified cases of all forms of TB (i.e. bacteriologically confirmed + clinically diagnosed), new and relapse cases
KP- other 2: Percentage of male sex workers that have received an HIV test during the reporting period and know their results
Number of cases with RR-TB and/or MDR-TB that began second-line treatment
Percentage of new and relapse TB patients tested using WHO recommended rapid tests at the time of diagnosis
Percentage of transgender people that have received an HIV test during the reporting period and know their results
Percentage of people living with HIV that initiated ART with a CD4 count of <200 cells/mm³
Percentage of sex workers that have received an HIV test during the reporting period and know their results
Number of needles and syringes distributed per person who injects drugs per year by needle and syringe programs
Impact indicator for THA-C-DDC
TB incidence rate per 100,000 population
Number of AIDS-related deaths per 100,000 population
Percentage of transgender people who are living with HIV
Percentage of sex workers who are living with HIV
Percentage of men who have sex with men who are living with HIV
Number of new HIV infections per 1000 uninfected population
TB mortality rate per 100,000 population
TB prevalence rate per 100,000 population
Percentage of people who inject drugs who are living with HIV
HIV I-other 1: Modelled infections averted based on latest epidemiological data
